task.title: Update an Address
task.shortdesc: This tutorial will help you update existing addresses using the MyPack Portal.

taskbody.prereq: You must be logged in to the MyPack Portal to make changes to your address. Dual authentication may be required. There must also be an existing address in the portal. To add a new address, See Adding a New Address.

step.cmd: From the left-hand navigation menu, select Addresses.
Under the appropriate header, click on the address box for the address you wish to change.
Update the address fields as necessary
